name: Spellcaster (Healer)
languages: Common, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Potent Cantrip
text: The spellcaster can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the damage it deals with any cantrip.

trait.name: Spellcasting (Healer)
text: The spellcaster's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The spellcaster has following cleric spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): guidance, light, resistance, sacred flame
• 1st level (4 slots): bless, cure wounds, shield of faith
• 3rd level (3 slots): protection from energy, revivify

action.name: Quarterstaff
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

spells: guidance, light, resistance, sacred flame, bless, cure wounds, shield of faith, aid, lesser restoration, protection from energy, revivify, death ward
description: Source: Essentials Kit: Storm Lord's Wrath
